channel.title: Request multiplayer server mod here
channel.description:
Hello, guys!
I see that multiplayer is dying and not interesting . Tell me what server mod you like. Which mod you played in HL1 for a long time? Maybe its Zombie, AG, XDM, CTF, domination mod?
Thank you, I am planing to open BM server, I am SM plugin dev

item.title: Request multiplayer server mod here
item.dc:creator: Cryoshell
item.description:
Perhaps make a game mode aliens vs humans
In this mode can be 3 class on each side. Aliens : slaves, grunts and gargantua . Humans : guard, soldier and a tank

Read full topic

item.title: Request multiplayer server mod here
item.dc:creator: Cryoshell
item.description:
You can make a zombie class 4: headcrabs zombie scientist (normal), zombie guard (more health and damage but less speed and attack), zombie soldiers (more health, slow, special attack pulls out a grenade zombies in HL2). It is also possible after updating Xen can be added as a class baby crab creeping poison and gonrach as the boss. But need a zombie model of soldier .

Read full topic

item.title: Request multiplayer server mod here
item.dc:creator: Cryoshell
item.description:
Zombie and CTF
Can you make zombie mod like in gmod , zombie classes and to playerskins(like marine ,scientist ,guard) for whom you play did not change the skin that you chose to customize the player (in you set zombie skin it will set as hev scientist as def)?Also you can use this ammo crates from bm https://imgur.com/dbWKDCf

Read full topic
